statements: UPDATE dna_sequence_data SET sequence = 'ATGCATGC', sequence_length = 8, gene_name = 'Gene1', organism_name = 'Organism1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dna_sequence_data SET gene_name = 'Gene2', organism_name = 'Organism2', sequence_length = 10, sequence = 'TACGTACGTACG' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE dna_sequence_data SET gene_name = 'ABC', sequence_length = 500 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE dna_sequence_data SET organism_name = 'Human', sequence = 'ATGCATGC', sequence_length = 800 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence = 'ATCG' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dna_analysis_results SET result = 'Positive' WHERE dna_id = 2 AND analysis_type = 'PCR';
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence = 'ATCGGCTTAA' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE dna_analysis_results SET analysis_type = 'Secondary Structure Prediction', result = 'Helix' WHERE dna_id = 2
UPDATE dna_sequences SET length = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sequence_metadata SET creator_id = 5, data_quality = 8 WHERE sample_id = 'sample_123';
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence = 'ATGCTAGCTAGCTAGCTAG', length = 18 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sequence_metadata SET data_quality = 9, creator_id = 101, sample_id = 'SMPL001' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence = 'ATGCGA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Research Project' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence='ATCGGATC', research_project_id=3 WHERE id=5;
UPDATE relationships SET sequence_one_id=8, sequence_two_id=7, relationship_type='Similarity' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence_data = 'ATCGATCG', sequence_length = 8 WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE sequence_patterns SET pattern_data = 'GCTAG', pattern_id = 4;
UPDATE dna_sequences SET sequence_length = 100 WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE sequence_patterns SET pattern_data = 'Updated Pattern' WHERE pattern_id = 2;
